title: Chronotx Watchmaker Watch Face
summary: Customizable Chrono Round Android Wear Watchmaker Watch Face LG Moto360
description: ***This watch face requires the latest Watchmaker  http://goo.gl/FMxUfY to make sure you can see all of the newest features. Always a Good Idea to Install the Newest Beta.*** And of course a round smart watch.Features Include:⌚ Tap the Left Side - 8 Unique Second Displays⌚ Tap the Color Wheel - Choose from 12 Schemes⌚ Tap the Temperature - New Animated 3 Day Forecast⌚ Tap the Step Counter - Shortcut to Google Fit⌚ Tap the Date - Open your Agenda**Cleaned up UI to Optimze Speed****Brought to life using some of the new wmwatch Transition Animations**Watch the video to see it in action.Why have 1 watch face when you can have over 100 different combinations?Watchmaker is an app that runs watchfaces on your smart watch.Watchmaker is sold seperately.Compatible with Moto 360,LG Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, and any other Android Wear round face watches that are able to run watchmaker and the wmwatch watchfaces.More features to be added soon....
descriptionHTML:
***This watch face requires the latest Watchmaker http://goo.gl/FMxUfY to make sure you can see all of the newest features. Always a Good Idea to Install the Newest Beta.*** And of course a round smart watch.

Features Include:
⌚ Tap the Left Side - 8 Unique Second Displays
⌚ Tap the Color Wheel - Choose from 12 Schemes
⌚ Tap the Temperature - New Animated 3 Day Forecast
⌚ Tap the Step Counter - Shortcut to Google Fit
⌚ Tap the Date - Open your Agenda

**Cleaned up UI to Optimze Speed**
**Brought to life using some of the new wmwatch Transition Animations**

Watch the video to see it in action.

Why have 1 watch face when you can have over 100 different combinations?

Watchmaker is an app that runs watchfaces on your smart watch.
Watchmaker is sold seperately.
Compatible with Moto 360,LG Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, and any other Android Wear round face watches that are able to run watchmaker and the wmwatch watchfaces.

More features to be added soon....
comments: I like the watch face, but thought there was a glitch initially, and gave a 3 star review, but since, the devoper  got back and explained what I was doing wrong. Thank you and I really glad he did, since I find this a very sharp looking and practical watch face. Worth every penny of the dollar it costs.
Looks Great,  but very buggy Looks great but keeps killing the battery and freezing on my moto 360. Will have to uninstall unfortunately
Awesome face This is a unique watch face with some of the smoothest animations I've ever seen. Battery life is great. Developer is very quick and helpful with email responses.
